class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, nums: List[int], target: List[int]) -> int:
        nd = nums[:]
        td = target[:]
        n = len(target)
        gap = [0] * n
        for i in range(1, n):
            nd[i] = nums[i] - nums[i-1]
            td[i] = target[i] - target[i-1]
            gap[i] = td[i] - nd[i]
        gap[0] = target[0] - nums[0]
        print(gap)
        pos = sum([g for g in gap if g>0])
        neg = sum([-g for g in gap if g<0])
        return max(pos, neg)
